properties.name: name
properties.description: If specified, displays the node name of the Abstract Syntax Tree.

properties.name: line_start
properties.description: Displays the line number where the symbol begins. (Location parameter)

properties.name: line_end
properties.description: Displays the line number where the symbol ends. (Location parameter)

properties.name: column_start
properties.description: Displays the column number where the symbol begins. (Location parameter)

properties.name: column_end
properties.description: Displays the column number where the symbol begins. (Location parameter)

properties.name: rel_path
properties.description: Displays the path name of the java file to be parsed.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Displays the value of the identifier e.g. an integer value (4).

properties.name: type
properties.description: Displays the type of the identifier.
